message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire something valuable. Would you like to purchase it from me for $11000?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I have to make a profit. I can meet you halfway between our last two offers, so I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. How about $9800?

I can see you're still a bit off on the price, but I'm willing to be flexible. I'll meet you at $10000, which is my minimum price. If you're interested, let me know, otherwise, I'll have to explore other options.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to get the best deal possible. How about $9500?
